survey_name: AI-Powered Personal Finance Management Usage Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and usage patterns regarding AI-powered personal finance management tools.

questions.question_text: Which AI-powered personal finance management tools have you used in the past 12 months?
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow multiple selections. Ensure 'Other' has a text field option.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with an optional text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which AI-powered personal finance management tools have you used in the past 12 months?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the AI-powered personal finance management tools you have used?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is not 'None'.
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction measurement. Ensure mobile-friendly display.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the AI-powered personal finance management tools you have used?
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is not 'None'.

questions.question_text: What features do you value the most in AI-powered personal finance tools?
